name: Infrasta
description: Infrasta is a decentralized infrastructure network that turns everyday devices such as smartphones and sensors into passive data nodes. Users can contribute real-world data like noise levels, temperature, GPS, and air quality and earn rewards. The platform enables verifiable, privacy-preserving data to be used by dApps, AI models, and DePIN ecosystems, helping power Ethereumâ€™s physical layer. No mining, staking, or crypto experience is required
